channel.title: [delta]Shops help
channel.description: Where is the code that I can make only one shop able to sell your items too it, but able to buy items from other shops?

item.title: [delta]Shops help
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

halflive9:

There was an option on delta servers for this. It was the last numer in your shops.cfg if I recall correctly. Try changing it to 1 or 2.

okay ill test it out but i think its the number after the shop name lol

Read full topic

item.title: [delta]Shops help
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:2, topic:536679”][quote author=MrFun link=topic=655491.msg4388351#msg4388351 date=1386526886]
Where is the code that I can make only one shop able to sell your items too it, but able to buy items from other shops?
[/quote]
Can you explain what you mean?

The way I understand it is that you want one shop that only sells stuff and doesn’t buy stuff. And a shop that does both?[/quote]
yea i want only the “buy anything shop” able for a player to sell items too but not the other shops

Read full topic
